    • Method Detail

      • limit

        public static int limit(int max,
                        int min,
                        int value)
        Limits the value to the passed max and min values.
        Parameters:
        max - Maximum value, inclusive, for value.
        min - Minimum value, inclusive, for value.
        value - Value to limit.
        Returns:
        The value if it is within the boundaries, or the boundary it exceeds itself.
        See Also:
        limit(double, double, double)

      • limit

                           double value)
        Limits the value to the passed max and min values.
        Parameters:
        max - Maximum value, inclusive, for value.
        min - Minimum value, inclusive, for value.
        value - Value to limit.

      • wrap

        public static int wrap(int max,
                       int min,
                       int val)
        Returns a corresponding value within [min, max] for val, wrapping it around the boundaries.
        Parameters:
        max - Upper wrapping point for val.
        min - Lower wrapping point for val.
        val - Value to wrap.
        Returns:
        Value within [0, lim].
